title: The Villain Discovered My Identity
summary:
Although she had been a promising practitioner of kendo in the past, due to an accident she was forced to lead a plain life. After Seo Yuri gets into a car accident during a trip back home, she reincarnates into the novel, *The Song of the Moon*, and becomes the elder twin sister of a side character who meets a destructive ending– Selena. Selena hopes to prevent the destruction of her family, however, she is forced to take the place of her runaway brother, Celestine, in the knights’ squadron! Will she be able to avoid the villainous Crown Prince, Ignis, and survive?!

---
A lifetime as a fencing prodigy prepared Eunha for her new role as Selena Evan, novel side character and daughter of a renowned swordsman. Life isn't actually so bad after being sucked into a fictional world, but she’s doomed to meet an untimely death if she can't escape the clutches of the villainous Prince Ignus. When Selena's twin brother, Celestine, runs away before his military conscription, she has no choice but to enlist under his name to avoid getting her entire family executed. But hiding her identity won’t be so easy once Ignus takes note of her impressive sword skills and sets his sights on turning "Sir Celestine" into his top henchman. With the threat of execution looming over her head, can Selena avoid getting caught by the villain?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%97%90%EA%B2%8C-%EC%A0%95%EC%B2%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%93%A4%EC%BC%9C%EB%B2%84%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/2812), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55402347)

title: How to Reject the King’s Scout
Obssesed butler
summary: No summary available.

title: The Little Princess Waits for the Breakup
The Reset Life of a Game Addict
summary:
Jinho Lee has just completed the ultimate challenge in the game Reset Life, where he had to experience all 99 possible endings to reach the final victory. After six years of intense gameplay, he feels a sense of achievement—but also an overwhelming emptiness. With nothing left to conquer in the game, Jinho finds himself at a loss, unsure of what to do next.

However, this feeling of burnout becomes the catalyst for an even greater transformation. Suddenly, Jinho’s life is reset in ways he never imagined—he becomes the top scorer in the nation, a model, a chef, and even a celebrity. What once seemed like distant dreams are now his new reality. But with this newfound success comes the question: is this truly the life he wanted?

title: Drug Devourer
summary:
One day, a gate suddenly opened in the heavens, bringing with it the invasion of monsters and the intervention of monks in the human world.

『Miracle Drug “Coffee” Administration』

『Medicinal Contents: Caffeine and Sugar』
☞ Provides energy
☞ Stimulates the central nervous system
☞ Maximizes senses and reflexes

The whole world appeared to slow down, and Hanyul’s medications began to show their true effects.

title: Since When You Were The Villain?
summary:
She was possessed by a book without knowing what novel it was. Then, one day, her fiance appeared. ‘Killian’ was a perfect Northern Duke with black hair, red eyes, and a handsome face. It was a contract marriage. ‘I can see that person is the male protagonist even if I rolled backwards…’
So, Sophia believed without a doubt. She thought he would be the male protagonist. But…
“Ah, I got caught.”
The smell of blood came on the tip of her nose. Killian’s eyes narrowed. Then she realized the fact that he was a villain.And a cold hand caressed her cheek.
“There won’t be a breakup, Sophie.”
Raising the corners of his lips slightly, he whispered softly. ‘I think this is also a cliché… I hate that cliché!’

title: S-Class Spirit Master’s Taming Diary
summary:
In a world where wars were fought with swords and magic, and the only transportation was by horse-drawn carriage…

There, I lived as a spirit master—and died. But then…

I was reborn?!

In this new life, there were hunters and monsters, just like in my previous one. But here, the concept of spirits didn’t exist at all.

"Jackpot!"

Monsters? Dungeons? That’s the hunters’ problem, right? All I want is the simple, ordinary life I’ve always dreamed of!

But, as they say, misfortune strikes when you least expect it.

In a not-so-coincidental coincidence, I touched a mysterious egg in a dungeon, and at that moment…

"Congratulations! You have awakened, Miss Yuina!"

I had awakened as an S-Class Spirit Master?!

With Iz, the mischievous spirit of water!
Rika, the playful spirit of wind!
And me, Yuina, the S-Class Spirit Master who has lost all hope of an ordinary life!

An S-Class Spirit Master's desperate journey to reclaim her peaceful life!
"Just give me back my normal life!"

title: Military Phoenix
summary: As a military commander, I crossed over to the Sky Spirit Continent due to an accident. After opening my eyes, I encountered an inexplicable assassination. To that, I just wanted to say, "You messed with the wrong person!" I signed the system on the front foot, awakened the top spiritual power on the back foot, carrying a bazooka to do in the real culprit, stirring him up! The only thing that hurts is that there are too many people who are interested in me, so can I get to that actual perpetrator, huh?

title: The Monster Knight wants Parental Leave
summary: Lucia is the captain of the imperial knights and a swordmaster famous for her extraordinary achievements. However, she regrets something on her deathbed: unknowingly aiding a nefarious group in their plot to sacrifice the saintess for profit. So when she wakes up in the past as her 25-year-old self, Lucia is determined to rescue the child saintess and keep her safe until she’s old enough to protect herself. But the formidable knight is completely clueless when it comes to raising a child... Will six months of maternity leave be enough time for her to figure things out?

title: The Constellations Are My Disciples
summary:
Beryl Gardinant, a self-proclaimed "humble old man", is a sword instructor at his dojo in a rural, backwater village. In his younger years, he dreamed of glory as a master swordsman, but those days are long behind him. Out of the blue, he receives a visit from a famous former pupil who brings him world-shattering news - he's been appointed as a special instructor for the knights of the Liberion Order!

With his life now turned upside down, Beryl travels to the capital and reunites with some of his former students: elite knights, an ace wizard, and even an adventurer who's attained the highest guild rank possible. But why do they all want his tutelage?! As far as he's concerned, they clearly don't need him anymore. Can Beryl live up to his new position? And will he ever get a moment's peace away from his adoring students?!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Official English Light Novel:** [J-Novel Club](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)

title: I Killed an Academy Player
summary:
Being a character of your favorite game is great! Sure, he’s just a minor NPC, but Corin knows this game like the back of his hand. With his knowledge and the main player Sihu’s abilities, everything’s going smoothly - until Corin discovers Sihu’s been murdering innocent NPCs and stealing their items. 

Horrified but powerless to stop him, Corin awaits the end of the game - only for Sihu to mysteriously fail at the last mission. 

Instantly, Corin travels three years back in time. Now, he’s determined to kill Sihu and take on his role - defeat the final boss and save the world.

title: The Necromancer Family’s Young Heir
summary:
“Death is only the beginning.” 

Truer words were never spoken for young Leon von Marbas, the heir to a once-great house of necromancers. Forced to execute his own father by the lord of a rival house, Leon suddenly finds himself the leader of a declining clan under threat from enemies within and without. 

The only way to restore the glory of his house? Leon must strike a pact with the demon Marbas, the original source of the powerful necromancy that House Marbas was once known for…

title: The Devil Raises a Lady
summary:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)

title: One Husband Is Enough
summary: Getting reincarnated into the world of a novel is never easy, but possessing a doomed bride on her way down the aisle to marry a murderous emperor is just unfair! Now, the newly reincarnated Angelica has no choice but to learn to survive the whims of her new husband, Emperor Ranielo… Well, at least until he falls for his fated love interest and she can slip away unnoticed. But as the days pass, Ranielo’s interest in her only grows. Can this tyrant be tamed, or will Angelica find that some destinies can’t be unwritten?

title: The Time-Limited Villainess Who Makes Medicine
Surviving as an Obsessive Servant
summary:
In this world of a BL novel, I’ve died three times of the same rare disease as the sickly protagonist.
I couldn't accept dying such a pathetic death.
Thus, I took special measures.

'Let's try feeding a spoonful of the well-prepared medicine to the sickly protagonist!'
Young Master, I won’t miss a single drop of medicine, not even a breath!

I disguised myself as a servant to serve the sickly young master.
Even the spirit power from his breath would heal me, so what could be better than this!
But serving said individual was not easy…

“Get out! I said get out!! I’ve had enough of this!!! …Wait. What are you doing on your knees right now?”
“Young Master, if you’re going to throw it away, please throw it into my mouth.”

I said to him, who then withdrew his arm from throwing the medicine bottle in embarrassment.

"I wouldn’t mind if you just spray it onto my face instead…"

For a moment, his pupils dilated wildly.

***

I’m a do-if-you-must kind of girl.
While I was at it, I took good care of Young Master, who was my lifesaver.
As well as serving him, I hugged him, carried him, and brought him everywhere as his legs.

I wonder if he recognized my true value as the heir of a prestigious dukedom.
Young Master would occasionally gaze at me with intent, but he no longer tried to drive me away.

Now that I've recovered and repaid his kindness, it was time to figure out how I should leave…
But Young Master started acting strange.

“You said you like me so much, so why are you trying to run away?”
“...”
“You said you’d die without me.”

Before I knew it, he began to have the look of a hungry predator.

title: Night Journey
summary:
A historical Eastern romance where Beom-yoon, a younger man walking a blood-stained royal road, ascends to the untouchable position of emperor, seeking to possess Cheong-hee, an older woman. Based on the original work by Chomchom.

Beom-yoon, a prince of Goyeon with the destiny of a Yaksha, enters an arranged marriage with Cheong-hee, who is fated to be an exorcist and used as a living amulet.

"Do you pity me, Your Highness?"

"You'd better receive my respect while I treat you with honor..."

title: If You Desire to Keep Me [Official]
Absolute Regression
summary:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.

title: Mightiest Melee Magician
summary:
Sensing shifts in mana, successfully manifesting it, and attending the most prestigious school at the top of his class at a young age, Ruin Ardell is on track to become a great mage. Everything was going smoothly until he discovered that he had a condition preventing him from expelling mana. 

Ruin’s tumble from grace gave those jealous of him the opportunity to toy with him. But in the depths of his despair, he discovers a miracle in the form of a system message.

title: The Tutorial is Too Hard
summary:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.

title: The Sword God from a Ruined World
Max Talent Player
summary: In 2018, monsters swarmed Seoul, and heroic “players” saved the city. Fast forward a decade, Hyukjin Kim, stuck in a seven-year rut after failing to become a player himself, gets a do-over. Zapped back to 2018, Hyukjin seizes his chance to rewrite history. With knowledge from the future and his re-awakened player talents, Hyukjin battles beasts and conquers dungeons in a pulse-pounding quest for redemption and survival!

title: If I Don’t Die Soon, I Will Rule The Demon Realm
summary: Humanity’s strongest warrior was killed by demons amidst a battle and gained the power to reincarnate, but somehow did so as a demon. Only by dying he can go back to living as a human, so he committed suicide non-stop. But things turned out to be the opposite of what he expected…

title: The Spy’s Life In The Demonic Cult
summary: Jang Yiseo, a spy from the Murim Alliance who infiltrated the Demonic Cult, was given his first and last mission. To make the notoriously unruly Seventh Young Master, Ma-oh, the Vice Cult Leader! Despite his extraordinary martial prowess, Yiseo’s potential was hindered by his frail constitution. Meanwhile, Ma-Oh, a prodigious yet unpredictable force, walked the fine line between genius and madness. As their fates intertwined, the two had to navigate treachery, power struggles, and the ever-present risk of exposure. Can Jang Yiseo make Ma-Oh rise to the rank of being second only to the Cult Leader, or will the shadows consume them first?

title: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God
summary:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.

title: A Perfect Ending Plan of the Villain in a Fairy Tale
summary:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54970327), [Naver Series](http://naver.me/GLuxzytv)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94-%EC%86%8D-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%99%84%EB%B2%BD%ED%95%9C-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9-%ED%94%8C%EB%9E%9C/2867), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58925157)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-perfect-plan-for-a-fairy-tale-ending/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26297&contentId=297&platform=IA)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%8D%E6%B4%BE%E4%B9%9F%E6%83%B3%E8%A6%81%E6%9C%89%E5%AE%8C%E7%BE%8E%E7%B5%90%E5%B1%80/331)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Perfect-Plan-for-a-Fairy-Tale-Ending/571)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112309)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%93%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/382)

title: The Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly
summary:
I possessed a supporting character in a reverse harem novel. A young concubine who, in the end, was driven to death for treason after begging for attention from the regnant empress who was the female lead, and doing wicked things to the male leads who were the concubines. Despite everything, the fortunate thing was that I possessed her right after entering the Imperial Palace. Even if everyone in the Imperial Palace were wary of me, they didn’t hate me yet.

‘Let’s not be impudent, and be obedient.’

I obstinately didn’t need nor have the mindset of trying to be loved by the Empress. Although the male leads who were the concubines were giving me glances, I could just lie flat. Since it wasn’t even a very difficult thing, I really did so. It was definitely like that, but–

“Come to my bedchamber tonight. I’ll read you a fairy tale book!”

“P-please don’t cry. I’ll give you this.”

Just why is everyone’s attitude endlessly gentle? I couldn’t understand. And it was baffling.

‘…I don’t need it though?’

I wasn’t really a young kid lacking affection. And that gaze in which they looked at me as if I were the loveliest in the world was extremely uncomfortable. Just where would I use a fairy tale book that’s full of jewels and silk, and the magic pearl which is the Imperial family’s heirloom? Since it’s already been done, I just wish for everyone to get out of my palace.

---
In the nation of Seora, Yehwa Aryun is the Empress Regnant, and her court is full of consorts with special powers. The newest member of the imperial court is 8-year-old Sanya Yeoran. And although she has no powers, Sanya actually has the mind of an adult who knows exactly what will happen in this fantasy world, because she already read about it in her past life. Thanks to that, she comes up with a plan to avoid her tragic execution: stay away from Yehwa and her jealous consorts at all costs!

title: I Became a Tyrant’s Maid
summary:
Another world: Lexia, the first princess of the Kingdom of Arcelia. When it comes to decisiveness and the ability to take action, no one can match her; in some ways, she is the "strongest" princess. As a result of being extremely bored with life in the royal castle, the words she uttered were...

"I've made up my mind! I'm going to set out on a journey to save people who are in trouble!"

So, forcibly bringing along Luna—a girl who is her bodyguard and has a background as a top-notch assassin—Lexia sets off on an adventure around the world.

title: Baby Pharmacist Princess
summary:
Just by clicking the wrong button, I ended up possessing the game's princess character, "Cherise"! Yoon Che-ri, a graduate of a pharmaceutical university. Like the so-called 'hardcore gamer' she is, She unexpectedly appears in the VR game she plays every day. A red rabbit puts her in debt to the game, owing 10 billion gems...

If she doesn't repay the debt of 10 billion gems, she won't be able to log out?

♡ Surprise Quest Triggered ♡

User's ability confirmed as "Pharmaceuticals," customized settings have been completed accordingly. Future quests will focus on "Pharmaceuticals."

[Confirm] ◀

Huh? Why do I feel excessively capable...? If things go on like this, I might be able to return soon!
Will Cherise really be able to settle the 10 billion gem debt and return to her original world?

title: Please Treat Your Friends Preciously
summary:
I reincarnated as the younger sister of the male lead in a BL novel.
She's a fragile sunfish whose life is in danger even from catching a cold.

So, I took advantage of a childhood friend who has healing abilities.
The problem is, that ability manifests through skinship.
Anyway, it was only a matter of time before this little guy fell in love with the male protagonist, so I didn't worry for long.
We held hands and I stole his first kiss...

But then,
Since when...

"Lavie, you're beautiful."
"Huh...?"
"You should look outside. I couldn't stop myself when I saw you."
"Akka, stop it."
"If you keep getting nervous like that, it makes me wanna do it more."

Why is the guy who should be with the male lead suddenly doing this to me?!

title: The Perfect Plan to Avoid the Death Ending
summary: Reincarnated as Sienna Winter, a minor villain with a terminal illness, her only goal is survival. However, she accidentally awakens a sealed demon and gets trapped in a lifelong contract. But... she's already dying?!

title: Casting Cinderella
summary: A seasoned actress meets a sharp businessman with an unusual offer. It’s not about romance—it’s a game of deals, control, and blurred lines between acting and reality.

title: How to Protect My Sub Male Lead Dad
summary: Hanelope knows her dad, Prince Hart von Reinhart, is a good person, it’s just that the world doesn’t know it! The cunning Saint Asta has fooled everyone into thinking the prince is a cruel monster, so Hanelope is determined to put a stop to it once and for all! Hiding her quick wits behind a cute smile, she fights against pesky vassals, malicious rumors, and the manipulative Asta for her dad's happiness. Can Hanelope give her dad a happy ending? Or is this too much for a little girl to handle?

title: Underground of Babel (Official)
summary: Though she's a tomboy with a hangup over her tiny chest, Iori has a crush on Sota Seto, who is the pastry chef at the café where she works. Iori was sure that he wasn't interested in her until one day, he suddenly professes his love for her and goes on to kiss her. She sees him unclothed for the first time - and my, he's huge!! She never would have expected the graceful man's lips to be caressing her all over. It's terribly embarrassing, but she discovers that his you-know-what isn't gross at all…

title: I’m a Villain, But I’m Favored
summary:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52653435)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%ED%98%91%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EC%9D%B8%EB%8D%B0-%EB%82%B4%EA%B0%80-%EC%A0%9C%EC%9D%BC-%EC%8E%84/2455), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56271898)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/master-villainess-the-invincible/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A5%B3%E4%BF%A0%E7%95%B6%E5%AE%B6/99)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Akulah-Antagonis-Terkuat-di-Martial-Art/166)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62807)

title: Ugly Wife
summary: Reincarnated as the neglected wife of a duke who secretly loves the novel's heroine, she plans to divorce him to survive. Yet, he desperately begs her not to leave, confusing her as the story unfolds differently than she remembered.

title: The Tower Master Who Became the Grand Duchess
summary: A once content life shatters when Lacia, the 13th Tower Master, awakens in the body of the disgraced Duchess Eckhardt—powerless and trapped in a ruinous fate. Determined to reclaim her lost magic, she devises a bold plan, only to find herself entangled with the mysterious Duke Calix, who hides his true identity. As they navigate deception and unexpected attraction, will Lacia succeed in reclaiming her true self?

title: 24-hour Rebirth Consultation Centre
summary:
Inheriting the divine mission of assisting reincarnators, regressors, and transmigrators, Laura is the sole counselor at the Reincarnation Counseling Center.

But for some reason, the customers—meant to appear once every hundred years—haven’t shown up in five centuries.

After 500 years of waiting, Laura is ready to abandon the center for good when suddenly...

Her long-awaited customer appears.

Or rather, customers.

“...Possession, I think.”
“Regression.”
“Looks more like reincarnation.”
“...Has the world gone mad?”

Why are there three clients all at once?!

With 24 hours a day no longer enough, will Laura be able to handle this chaotic counseling session?

title: Now Come and Regret
summary:
The main character, Noah, is a reincarnated person. He was active as a sword saint in a previous life, and as a sage in another. But he’s been forced to work hard all his life, and he's sick of being a hero! One day, Noah dies and wakes up to find that he has been reborn as a prince. He had a high level of magical talent and the swordsmanship of a sword saint, but he didn't want to get busy again, so Noah pretended to be incompetent with all his might.

Then, on his 15th birthday. A skill appraisal revealed that he was incompetent (actually, he was just hiding it with his concealment skill). Noah was scorned and banished. With what seemed like a gesture of warmth, his father gave him a remote territory.

"Now I’ll enjoy my second life!" Noah was enthusiastic, but he didn't know.

Actually, the territory was in the devil's forest, which is said to be uninhabitable. But his past life was more advanced compared to this one, and the level of human beings in this world was lower. Noah's ability is revealed when he helps a girl who was attacked by a monster in the forest.

"Amazing!!! Noah-sama defeated a dragon with a single blow!"
"How did this happen? Ahhhhh!"

On the other hand, the royal family also noticed Noah's ability and came to take him back, but it was too late. At that time, Noah was already being praised by the people as the lord of the Demon Forest.

title: My Happy Ending Plan as a Side Character – I Refuse the Villainess’s Bad Ending!
Forget Marriage, I’d Rather Go Bankrupt
The Male Lead’s Handsomeness Is a Big Problem
My Male Lead Is the Northern Black-Haired Grand Duke
